title: Jaycoinz
author: Jaycoinz
content: Like every goals trading is likely to give everyone what he desires.     Let me go to the point trading has to do with either physical market or online marketing also know as digital marketing. On digital marketing trader are likely to use cryptocurrency which can be .  Bitcoin  Bitcoin core  Ethereum.  Or trading on asset such as    Gold  In the global economy today cryptocurrency trading tend as a wealth over physical trading, like wise investing on cryptocurrency contribute to ones income.  Let go into the society as a whole most wealthy and stable individual are in there position today as a result of investment which is cryptocurrency when we look at them most of them are into trading of assets. That is to say cryptocurrency add positive value in terms of wealth to investment management.. in order word I stand by advising everyone to engage into business with cryptocurrency.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Why are you saying there's an asset called "bitcoin core" and when did you last trade gold at a market?Was there a reason for your topic as I'm still confused of its purpose although crypto has been the best performing asset of the last decade (particularly bitcoin and ethereum).

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 22, 2023, 05:31:52 PM     Let me go to the point trading has to do with either physical market or online marketing also know as digital marketing. On digital marketing trader are likely to use cryptocurrency which can be .When was bitcoin used for digital marketing? Or since when do people spend their bitcoins just like dollars?The percentage of bitcoin acceptance in large stores and popular shopping sites is small, and some resort to indirect ways to buy with bitcoins, and therefore bitcoin is not the number one currency in digital marketing.Existing variants can only differ by adoption and further adoption.Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 22, 2023, 05:31:52 PMGoldHow can gold be used to buy something digital or even something real without going through paper money? Even the settlement of transactions, even if they were done with gold, is done with the value of paper money and not with the weights of gold.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Also know that trading is risky and can lead to loss of money too.Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 22, 2023, 05:31:52 PM     Let me go to the point trading has to do with either physical market or online marketing also know as digital marketing. On digital marketing trader are likely to use cryptocurrency which can be .  Bitcoin  Bitcoin core  Ethereum.Bitcoin core is a bitcoin wallet, the wallet that was first created in 2009, created by Satoshi Nakamoto who created bitcoin.Quote from: jackg on January 22, 2023, 07:50:08 PMWhy are you saying there's an asset called "bitcoin core" and when did you last trade gold at a market?I do not think OP is a trader, he is a beginner is all I think. You can trade gold on forex trading platforms or on commodity exchange that gold is listed. You can trade tokenized gold on exchanges like Binance in crypto.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: jackg on January 22, 2023, 07:50:08 PMWhy are you saying there's an asset called "bitcoin core" and when did you last trade gold at a market?Was there a reason for your topic as I'm still confused of its purpose although crypto has been the best performing asset of the last decade (particularly bitcoin and ethereum). I thought I was the only one reading the gibberish the OP narrated here, the thread might not be necessary truly. But on second thought, I think he/she does not know how to differentiate some terms thereby looping them together. There are places where investments and trading were supposed to have been strictly used, but marketing and confusing explanations were also seen.However, the end gist has been known wherein the investment in Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies is advocated.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: It's confusing with what you're trying to say and ask. I'll go over them one by one. Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 22, 2023, 05:31:52 PMLike every goals trading is likely to give everyone what he desires.So you are saying that trading is going to be the solution into success and getting the dreams of every man? - This will probably be subjective and not everyone will be successful in trading. So it would be dependent on how you are going to deal with tradingQuote from: Jaycoinz on January 22, 2023, 05:31:52 PM     Let me go to the point trading has to do with either physical market or online marketing also know as digital marketing. On digital marketing trader are likely to use cryptocurrency which can be .  Bitcoin  Bitcoin core  Ethereum.  Or trading on asset such as    GoldThese are the topics that you have in mind in digital marketing. Am I correct? I don't know why it's connected to trading though. Or are these the subjects you are going to search for when determining your trading?Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 22, 2023, 05:31:52 PM  In the global economy today cryptocurrency trading tend as a wealth over physical trading, like wise investing on cryptocurrency contribute to ones income.  Let go into the society as a whole most wealthy and stable individual are in there position today as a result of investment which is cryptocurrency when we look at them most of them are into trading of assets. That is to say cryptocurrency add positive value in terms of wealth to investment management.. in order word I stand by advising everyone to engage into business with cryptocurrency. You are just saying with this part to trade and invest your money in crypto. You just made it complicated IMO.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: I'm trying to catch the OP's point,The OP termed "trade" about any entity or activity that is exchanged for digital goods, physical goods, or even services like digital marketing because basically everyone is going to make a fortune out of it. And as a conclusion and suggestion in the last paragraph, investing is an activity that wealthy or financially stable people do successfully.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Trading have to do with risk measure, either advantages and disadvantages. The wealth of trading starts when you know the rudiments of trading. And i believe that seriously concerning trading. And secondly i believe that trading have to come with this particular measure, you most make a research and know the possible secret that's behind trading.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Are you saying that trade is the way to wealth? If so, it's a shame that not everyone can go there because trading is not as easy as one might think, let alone crypto trading. Trading itself has risks that not everyone can afford, especially when they experience losses in trading.But when you choose to invest in crypto, especially bitcoin, you can make big profits in the future, especially if you can buy bitcoin when the price is still below.Perhaps, you need to explain in more detail what you mean so we don't misunderstand you.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 22, 2023, 05:31:52 PMLike every goals trading is likely to give everyone what he desires.While I mildly ignore your other comments for lack of clarification, let me speedily respond to this in quote. Yes, "trading is likely to give everyone what he desires." Actually, it does give. It's just that the players don't often like the other side of what it gives. Everyone likes to seen the green (profit) side of trading and not when it turns bloody red (loss). Trading is risky just the same way it's lucrative. One only needs to get a handle on it and the whole keys fall in pleasant places.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: I met some guy a few years back and whenever he was talking about Bitcoin he was actually talking about Bitcoin Cash. And when he was talking about Bitcoin he would say Bitcoin Core. He said that Bitcoin Cash is the real Bitcoin. So I am pretty sure the OP copied this text from somewhere he found on the web.No idea what gold has to do with it. Trading gold will never make you rich unless you degen trade it at 100x leverage. It’s currently like $1900 and it’ll be a decade before it doubles in value. Unlike Bitcoin and Ethereum.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: maydna on January 23, 2023, 01:21:13 PMAre you saying that trade is the way to wealth?The OP is clueless. He talks about trading as wealth but it seems that trading in any case and for a very small minority is income, not wealth. Wealth is what you keep from your income but that is a later step that has nothing to do with trading. This does not take into account that most people lose money with trading. If he were talking about B&H as wealth, yes he would be correct, because if you take a long-term portfolio of stocks what you are doing is increasing your wealth. The same as if you accumulate Bitcoin.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 22, 2023, 05:31:52 PMLet go into the society as a whole most wealthy and stable individual are in there position today as a result of investment which is cryptocurrency when we look at them most of them are into trading of assets. You're confused, yes there are wealthy people that have become wealthy due to crypto but if you're talking about the wealthiest people in the world then they're not into crypto and they've built their empire through experience and a long period of time. You're right that they're into assets but take the example of Warren Buffett, he's an investor and focuses more on a long-term style of investing and that has made him wealthy. There are investments that will be good for you and not for the others so I think you have to assess first what you'll compare.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Quote from: Poker Player on January 24, 2023, 05:19:34 AMQuote from: maydna on January 23, 2023, 01:21:13 PMAre you saying that trade is the way to wealth?The OP is clueless. He talks about trading as wealth but it seems that trading in any case and for a very small minority is income, not wealth. Wealth is what you keep from your income but that is a later step that has nothing to do with trading. This does not take into account that most people lose money with trading. If he were talking about B&H as wealth, yes he would be correct, because if you take a long-term portfolio of stocks what you are doing is increasing your wealth. The same as if you accumulate Bitcoin.If so, it means that there is a relationship between trade and wealth because wealth is something we already have, and trade can be a way to increase wealth. Trading can be a source of income for some people with trading skills, and they can benefit from trading it.And you are right that by collecting bitcoins, we will have a way to increase our wealth. And with so many choices of coins in the crypto market, it seems like he wants to show that we have a rich opportunity in the crypto market.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 22, 2023, 05:31:52 PM  Let go into the society as a whole most wealthy and stable individual are in there position today as a result of investment which is cryptocurrency when we look at them most of them are into trading of assets. Except that you are talking about Forex trading that has been a while but cryptocurrency trading will not be attributed to the wealthy and stable people in the society. Hodling crypto is far older than trading crypto and cryptocurrency itself is around 11 years old while the wealthy in the society have long been wealthybefore crypto trading became this popular and moreover many wealthy people don't openly associate themselves with cryptocurrency. Someone like Warren buffet as one of the wealthy doesn't publicly support crypto.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Not every rich and stable individuals are into crypto trading, and take note trading can not guarantee your success,because not every trader in bitcoin is successful. If you understand the crptomarket and trading risk management,then you can make profit. The best way to make profit in bitcoin is when you hodli for a long term and you sell at ATH,then you can make good profit from your investment.For you to be a trader risk is involved especially in crpto assets,the price can change at anytime due to the volatile nature of bitcoin and if you are not an expert,you can loose a huge sum. Gold is not used for trading,neither cryptocurrency but fiat is what we use to trade either in buying or selling. Don't get everything twisted, you are a newbie and need to understand more about trading and investing. Not all investors are traders.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: maydna on January 24, 2023, 01:22:36 PMQuote from: Poker Player on January 24, 2023, 05:19:34 AMQuote from: maydna on January 23, 2023, 01:21:13 PMAre you saying that trade is the way to wealth?The OP is clueless. He talks about trading as wealth but it seems that trading in any case and for a very small minority is income, not wealth. Wealth is what you keep from your income but that is a later step that has nothing to do with trading. This does not take into account that most people lose money with trading. If he were talking about B&H as wealth, yes he would be correct, because if you take a long-term portfolio of stocks what you are doing is increasing your wealth. The same as if you accumulate Bitcoin.If so, it means that there is a relationship between trade and wealth because wealth is something we already have, and trade can be a way to increase wealth. Trading can be a source of income for some people with trading skills, and they can benefit from trading it.And you are right that by collecting bitcoins, we will have a way to increase our wealth. And with so many choices of coins in the crypto market, it seems like he wants to show that we have a rich opportunity in the crypto market.A trading skill I guess is wealth. So yea you definitely have a value if you can make money out of money, it's how the wealthy people do it. Making money out of money. Not everyone can last in crypto. A holder can panic and sell in a bear market and start gambling like a maniac and lose it all but a person who can trade and accumulate more BTC with a little BTC capital can definitely survive in the crypto industry.

comments.author: Ararbermas
comments.body: You must know the difference between crypto assets and where the gold asset belong as well.  Btw i never see or heard bitcoin core in the market or maybe a platform only?Anyways cryptocurrency is already known about making money especially bitcoin and other major alts in the market.. If i will choose which one is more profitable and can make quick profits then that would be crypto over stock whether trading or investment, crypto still the best one in my personal opinion.

comments.author: Negotiation
comments.body: Without trading skills it is very difficult to make profit  good knowledge about trading it is never possible to increase wealth. Bitcoin is best for long term investment and helps in wealth growth. Being the most popular cryptocurrency in the world, bitcoin is more reliable and has a great market value as the first choice on every bitcoin trading platform. Bitcoin will give good profit with wealth growth as the price of bitcoin rises, it becomes more valuable to platforms.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: Negotiation on January 24, 2023, 05:29:03 PMWithout trading skills it is very difficult to make profit  good knowledge about trading it is never possible to increase wealth. Bitcoin is best for long term investment and helps in wealth growth. Being the most popular cryptocurrency in the world, bitcoin is more reliable and has a great market value as the first choice on every bitcoin trading platform. Bitcoin will give good profit with wealth growth as the price of bitcoin rises, it becomes more valuable to platforms.This is what i have been emphasizing on since, trading have different dimensions you apply in order to make a profit,and it's quite understood that trading have a skill and the skills have to be known more through a constant practicing, because sometimes we do correct or understand some certain mistakes occurrence in trading through your mistake which leads to lose of profit. So in the aspect of cryptocurrency generally and the best coin to invest with. It's audible to deaf and crystal clear to the blinds that Bitcoin is best coin that have potential than any other coins. Because the values always been in fluctuating circle but quickly regain it's potentiality when it decreases, but altcoins can die off during long term investment and can never ressurect again, so theirs is huge difference between Bitcoin and any other coin.
